reviewText:
I like the video... unpretentious and in a natural setting... right to the point... and yes for everyone no matter what your Yoga level is. It also talks about breathing.

After you repeat the video and practice a few times with it,  it is easy to find your own Sun Salutation style that works with your own body shape and ability.

your price is way too high. this can be purchased on Deepak's website for half the price !!
I think you should check prices of new before you set your prices on your used items. Not buying it !
